attributes.action: To create a policy to prevent energy providers from passing on the costs of meeting the green targets onto the public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A policy should be created to ensure energy providers fully cover the costs of meeting the green targets instead of passing them onto their customers. They can therefore be more accountable and prove their commitment to green issues. We are in very difficult times, families have less income due to company compulsory closures/shut downs, no cost of living increases granted for this year, etc. Costs for everything are constantly rising.
